overview: Jayo Jayo Debi is a Bangla romantic comedy film starring Sanchaari Das, Neha Amandeep, Saptarshi Maulik, Saborni Saha, Rishav Basu, Anindya Bose, Pabitra Denre, Arnab Biswas, Amlan Majumder, Buddhadev Bhattacharya and Pritha Sengupta. Six young friends come together to organize a Saraswati puja and invite a young priest who chants mantra in Rap style. However, they face many obstacles which challenge their relationship with each other. Will their friendship and love sail through the test of time?
title: Jayo Jayo Debi
